input.sentences: this was our first vacation together .
[female] had brunch with a few birds . it was so hilarious .
here we are standing in front of some beautiful scenery . we were so in love .
finding water this blue is hard .
it was a nice sunny day on the beach . the sand was so hot .
output.sentences: We chose a boardwalk where we'd heard there was a great view the first day of our vacation.
As this picture shows, we found the perfect spot for brunch.
The scenery along the way to find a spot on the beach inspired some cuddling, and a passing "friend" volunteered to take this picture.
It wasn't hard finding a spot that was lively for sitting and gazing.
And here's how the day ended, with yet another new "friend" to photograph the ending of this sunny day.
